title: My Sister Asked What She Should Buy From Nordstrom’s Half-Yearly Sale—I Sent Her This Super Chic List
description: From summer sandals to staple jeans.
author: Judith Jones
excerpt: From sleek sandals to staple jeans, here's everything we recommend buying from Nordstrom's epic halg-yearly sale.
text: There's nothing my sister and I love more than a good sale, especially when said sale happens to be at one of our go-to stores, which brings me to why we're here today. Nordstrom just kicked off its epic Half-Yearly sale, and the offerings are top-notch—with huge discounts on select styles now through June 1.Since my sister loves fashion and always wants to stay ahead of the styles and staples to invest in from season to season, she asked her little sister to do the hard work for her (story of my life!) and send a list of Nordstrom items she should scoop up from Nordstrom's Half-Yearly sale. Of course, I happily obliged. Shopping is where I shine, after all! Below, I'm sharing the chicest sale items I suggested to my big sis—from sleek sandals to dreamy dresses—that will unquestionably elevate her wardrobe. Keep scrolling for some major discounts you don't want to miss. LIONESS Horizon Open Tie Back Top Jacquemus Le Calino Leather Top Handle Bag Add a luxe touch to your look. LIONESS Bessette Low Rise Pants L'AGENCE Aveline Slide Sandal Sleek kitten-heels you can pair with literally everything. indego africa Braided Raffia Day Bag Natural Everyone needs an effortless raffia bag for the summer season. French Connection Birdie Square Neck Minidress The perfect LWD for summer. Dolce Vita Laury Strappy Sandal Strappy black sandals for the summer win. Open Edit Luxe Sculpt Rib One-Shoulder Top Ready for alfresco drinks. HALSTON Tasha Shoulder Bag East-West bags are everywhere right now. ASTR the Label Milani Wide Leg Pants Cotton On All Day V Neck Halter Scoop it up before it sells out. Caslon® Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants Linen pants season is finally here. Free People Varsity Vibes Stripe Oversize Cotton Button-Up Shirt A fashion girl essential. JW Anderson Jwa Corner Canvas Top Handle Bag The best time to invest in a designer handbag is during Nordstrom's Half-Yearly sale. Billabong High Tides Raw Hem High Waist Denim Shorts The pair you'll reach for all summer. Cotton On Women's All Day Crew Tee A cute baby tee for under $15. COTTON ON BODY Boyfriend Boxer Pant I'll be living (and lounging) in these pants all season. Steve Madden Dreaming Mary Jane Flat Cherry red shoes are trending. Caslon® Merino Wool Blend Crewneck Sweater Steve Madden Cary Heeled Sandal New summer sandals loading. Nordstrom Pima Cotton Slub Crewneck T-Shirt It's a butter yellow summer. Etro Medium Vela Shoulder Bag Topshop Mid Rise Wide Leg Jeans The silhouette the fashion set love. It's all about suede sneakers this season. ELOQUII Square Neck Button-Up Vest Add instant polish to your look. Kenneth Cole Crisscross Waist Wide Leg Pants Caslon® Textured Pima Cotton Cardigan Mansur Gavriel Mini Candy Leather Hobo Bag The perfect way to lean into this season's butter yellow color trend. Madewell Drawstring Waist Low Slung Baggy Jeans The ideal jeans for summer. BDG Urban Outfitters Front Button Knit Sweater Vest Le Specs Outta Love 51mm Oval Sunglasses Oval sunglasses are loved by It-girls and celebs alike. Cotton On Women's Haven Micro Short It doesn't get comfier (or cuter). Charles Henry Sleeveless Fit & Flare Dress Expect to see this silhouette everywhere this summer. AllSaints Stevie Cotton T-Shirt Stock up on the essentials. Nordstrom High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Don't miss out on these majorly discounted jeans. Faithfull the Brand Jackie Linen Vest Run, don't walk when Faithful the Brand go on sale. Steve Madden Patsy Slide Sandal Easy slide sandals to pair with your dresses and jeans. French Connection Cozysoft Crop Cardigan When the AC is blasting in your office, you'll be thankful for this chic cardi. PAIGE Cameron High Waist Ankle Wide Leg Jeans Just add a black belt, a black top, and the kitten heels below. Marc Fisher LTD Tracey Kitten Heel Slide Sandal Cotton On Women's Elle Linen Tunic Top A light linen top for those sweltering summer days. Cotton On Women's Haven Wide Leg Pant Cotton On Women's Byron Scoop Cami You can never have too many. SKIMS Fits Everybody Lace T-Shirt Bra I always invest in bras during Nordstrom's big sales. Cotton On Women's Haven Multi Tiered Maxi Skirt FRNCH Isilda Mixed Media Halter Neck Cotton Dress Italian vacation dress found. Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Jane Flat I personally own these in black and white. They're crazy comfortable. COTTON ON BODY Women's Active Core Rib Racer Tank Time for some new tank tops. SKIMS Cotton Blend Fleece Classic Shorts Retro-cool SL72's are a favorite among the fashion set.
html:
There's nothing my sister and I love more than a good sale, especially when said sale happens to be at one of our go-to stores, which brings me to why we're here today. Nordstrom just kicked off its epic Half-Yearly sale, and the offerings are top-notch—with huge discounts on select styles now through June 1.

Since my sister loves fashion and always wants to stay ahead of the styles and staples to invest in from season to season, she asked her little sister to do the hard work for her (story of my life!) and send a list of Nordstrom items she should scoop up from Nordstrom's Half-Yearly sale. Of course, I happily obliged. Shopping is where I shine, after all! Below, I'm sharing the chicest sale items I suggested to my big sis—from sleek sandals to dreamy dresses—that will unquestionably elevate her wardrobe. Keep scrolling for some major discounts you don't want to miss.

LIONESS

Horizon Open Tie Back Top

Jacquemus

Le Calino Leather Top Handle Bag

Add a luxe touch to your look.

LIONESS

Bessette Low Rise Pants

L'AGENCE

Aveline Slide Sandal

Sleek kitten-heels you can pair with literally everything.

indego africa

Braided Raffia Day Bag Natural

Everyone needs an effortless raffia bag for the summer season.

French Connection

Birdie Square Neck Minidress

The perfect LWD for summer.

Dolce Vita

Laury Strappy Sandal

Strappy black sandals for the summer win.

Open Edit

Luxe Sculpt Rib One-Shoulder Top

Ready for alfresco drinks.

HALSTON

Tasha Shoulder Bag

East-West bags are everywhere right now.

ASTR the Label

Milani Wide Leg Pants

Cotton On

All Day V Neck Halter

Scoop it up before it sells out.

Caslon®

Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants

Linen pants season is finally here.

Free People

Varsity Vibes Stripe Oversize Cotton Button-Up Shirt

A fashion girl essential.

JW Anderson

Jwa Corner Canvas Top Handle Bag

The best time to invest in a designer handbag is during Nordstrom's Half-Yearly sale.

Billabong

High Tides Raw Hem High Waist Denim Shorts

The pair you'll reach for all summer.

Cotton On

Women's All Day Crew Tee

A cute baby tee for under $15.

COTTON ON BODY

Boyfriend Boxer Pant

I'll be living (and lounging) in these pants all season.

Steve Madden

Dreaming Mary Jane Flat

Cherry red shoes are trending.

Caslon®

Merino Wool Blend Crewneck Sweater

Steve Madden

Cary Heeled Sandal

New summer sandals loading.

Nordstrom

Pima Cotton Slub Crewneck T-Shirt

It's a butter yellow summer.

Etro

Medium Vela Shoulder Bag

Topshop

Mid Rise Wide Leg Jeans

The silhouette the fashion set love.

It's all about suede sneakers this season.

ELOQUII

Square Neck Button-Up Vest

Add instant polish to your look.

Kenneth Cole

Crisscross Waist Wide Leg Pants

Caslon®

Textured Pima Cotton Cardigan

Mansur Gavriel

Mini Candy Leather Hobo Bag

The perfect way to lean into this season's butter yellow color trend.

Madewell

Drawstring Waist Low Slung Baggy Jeans

The ideal jeans for summer.

BDG Urban Outfitters

Front Button Knit Sweater Vest

Le Specs

Outta Love 51mm Oval Sunglasses

Oval sunglasses are loved by It-girls and celebs alike.

Cotton On

Women's Haven Micro Short

It doesn't get comfier (or cuter).

Charles Henry

Sleeveless Fit & Flare Dress

Expect to see this silhouette everywhere this summer.

AllSaints

Stevie Cotton T-Shirt

Stock up on the essentials.

Nordstrom

High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Don't miss out on these majorly discounted jeans.

Faithfull the Brand

Jackie Linen Vest

Run, don't walk when Faithful the Brand go on sale.

Steve Madden

Patsy Slide Sandal

Easy slide sandals to pair with your dresses and jeans.

French Connection

Cozysoft Crop Cardigan

When the AC is blasting in your office, you'll be thankful for this chic cardi.

PAIGE

Cameron High Waist Ankle Wide Leg Jeans

Just add a black belt, a black top, and the kitten heels below.

Marc Fisher LTD

Tracey Kitten Heel Slide Sandal

Cotton On

Women's Elle Linen Tunic Top

A light linen top for those sweltering summer days.

Cotton On

Women's Haven Wide Leg Pant

Cotton On

Women's Byron Scoop Cami

You can never have too many.

SKIMS

Fits Everybody Lace T-Shirt Bra

I always invest in bras during Nordstrom's big sales.

Cotton On

Women's Haven Multi Tiered Maxi Skirt

FRNCH

Isilda Mixed Media Halter Neck Cotton Dress

Italian vacation dress found.

Sam Edelman

Michaela Mary Jane Flat

I personally own these in black and white. They're crazy comfortable.

COTTON ON BODY

Women's Active Core Rib Racer Tank

Time for some new tank tops.

SKIMS

Cotton Blend Fleece Classic Shorts

Retro-cool SL72's are a favorite among the fashion set.
